name: Turbo Fuse 110 FY
description: Turbo Fuse 110 FY cyanoacrylate adhesive product is detectable using an ultravilolet (UV) light. Turbo Fuse Fluorescent advanced formula is designed to polymerize instantly by absorbing surface moisture . The product’s performance has been tested with a variety of materials , and is recommended for a multitude of applications. It’s fluorescence allows it to be detected with a UV light. The fast curing qualities make it especially desirable in high speed industrial production. Turbo Fuse Fluorescent is ideal for use in applications that require an easily handled high viscosity adhesive.
